img_above_text:
![Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6e/Starlit_Cloud-Bidden_Antler.jpg)
To obtain the Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler, you need to defeat Kang-Jin Loong in Snowhill Path in Mirrormere in The New West.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Weapons locations and Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game.

img_summary: The image depicts an intense battle scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the protagonist is confronting a formidable dragon-like creature in a snowy, mountainous environment. This visual accompanies a guide on how to obtain the Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler by defeating the boss Kang-Jin Loong in Snowhill Path, Mirrormere. The surrounding text provides additional resources for locating various items and equipment within the game.
